label: AzureBlobKnowledgeSourceParameters
description: Parameters for Azure Blob Storage knowledge source.

fields.label: Connection String
fields.tooltip: Key-based connection string or the ResourceId format if using a managed identity.

fields.label: Container Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the blob storage container.

fields.label: Folder Path
fields.tooltip: Optional folder path within the container.

fields.label: Is ADLS Gen2
fields.tooltip: Set to true if connecting to an ADLS Gen2 storage account. Default is false.

fields.label: Created Resources
fields.tooltip: Resources created by the knowledge source.
